mapper.select: SELECT t.task_name AS taskName, t.task_assigned_user_id AS taskAssignedUserId, t.task_type_id AS taskTypeId, tp.task_type_name AS taskTypeName, t.task_tag_id AS taskTagId, tg.task_tag_name AS taskTagName, t.create_user_id AS createUserId, t.update_user_id AS updateUserId, t.begin_time AS beginTime, t.update_time AS updateTime, t.end_time AS endTime FROM task t LEFT JOIN task_tag tg ON t.task_tag_id = tg.id LEFT JOIN task_type tp ON t.task_type_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN user u ON t.create_user_id = u.id WHERE t.id = #{id} and t.is_delete = 0
